name: An Old Chest
description: As you walk through the forest your foot bumps an object hidden under some bramble. As you inspect it you notice it is an old wooden chest.

name: Wolf Attack
description: The forest is quiet. Something feels off. Suddenly you hear a growl. You turn to see a large wolf behind you. It looks hungry.

name: Wolf Pack Attack
description: As you make your way through the forest you stop in a clearing for a break. You suddenly feel hungry eyes watching you from the trees.
